title: The Laser beam
creator_credit: Handel Film Corporation and Leo A. Handel
brief_description: Uses animation to explain the principle of the laser. Shows some of the applications of lasers in medicine, industry, communications, space exploration and the holograms that may lead to three-dimensional television. Traces the history of lasers and shows how emission spectra and lasers are related. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
